entry.title: Dr. Dabber GHOST Vaporizer Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dr. Dabber
Type: Vaporizer
Price: 44.99

The Dr. Dabber Ghost vape pen is the original low-heat vaporizer pen for oils and waxes. Our Titanium Technology heats to the ideal temperature slowly, instead of burning red hot on contact. This eliminates the burned, electric taste synonymous with vaporizer pens, ensuring you can enjoy the flavor of your oils or waxes. The Ghost Vaporizer Kit comes with everything you need to get started, including a USB Charger, silicone storage ball, loading tool and extra replacement titanium atomizer.

 

  • Sleek, Portable Design
  • Long Battery Life
  • USB Charging
  • Dab Tool Included
  • Extra Replacement Top Included
  • Shatterproof Storage Ball Included

entry.title: Dr. Dabber LIGHT Vaporizer Kit

The Dr. Dabber Light vape pen is the compact counterpart to the Dr. Dabber Ghost. Packing the same award-winning low-heat Titanium Technology in a tiny package, the Light is big on flavor and small on compromise. Featuring the same high-quality components incorporated into a slimmer, stealthier design, the Dr. Dabber Light Vaporizer pen can go anywhere you need to be.

entry.title: Dr. Dabber Budder Cutter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dr.Dabber
Type: Dabbing Tool
Price: 32.99

The Dr. Dabber Budder Cutter is a heated, multi-use dabbing device, designed for sticky, hard to manage oils or waxes. The heat source is carefully calibrated to avoid overheating while minimizing heating time to ensure a perfect cutting/loading temperature. It also doubles as a heated loading tool for our vaporizer pens. Featuring interchangeable heating tips, the Budder Cutter is an innovative, versatile tool suitable for many different materials and applications - designed for the dab connoisseur.

 

  • Sleek, Portable Design
  • Long Battery Life
  • Calibrated Heating
  • 7 Interchangeable Tips
  • 1 Year Warranty
  • Percolator Attachment Included
  • Sleek, Stylish Design

 

Slice and Dice with the Budder Cutter!

 

*This unit is not a vaporizer.

entry.title: Dr. Dabber SWITCH Vaporizer Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dr. Dabber
Type: Vaporizer
Price: 344.90

The Dr. Dabber SWITCH is a revolutionary, patent-pending induction heating vaporizer for both oils and flowers. With the press of a button, you can transform the SWITCH from a full-fledged oil rig into an electric flower vaporizer. This unmatched versatility, paired with the incredible heating speed and unparalleled battery life puts the Dr. Dabber SWITCH in a league of its own. With 150 uses on a single charge as well as pass-through charging, the SWITCH can be used as both a desktop and a portable vaporizer. Welcome to the Future.

Kit Includes: Dab Tool, Silicone Wax Container, Reverse Action Tweezers, Ceramic Flower Filter, Carb Cap, Glass Percolator Attachment, & Quick Reference Cards.

 

  • Power Output up to 120W
  • Battery Capacity: 33.3 watt-hours
  • Compatible with Flower and Concentrates
  • Precision Heating Induction Cups
  • Customizable Hold Times
  • Self-Cleaning Mode
  • Auto Cooldown Cycles
  • Standby Lighting
  • Integrated Power Management
  • Pass Through Charging
  • Glass Percolator Attachment Included
  • Sleek, Stylish Design


Powerful & Smart

Whether it’s particularly dense flower or very viscous oil, the SWITCH has 25 carefully calibrated heat settings to handle any situation. These 25 heat settings aren't just a selling feature...there is method to our madness. If you want an emphasis on flavor, there is a setting for that. If you prefer superior vapor density, there’s a setting for that too. If you want to crank it up for a cloudy experience, no problem. Running out of material at home and want to use a smaller amount than you normally do? Just turn it down a couple notches. The SWITCH is designed by people who understand that no two hits are the same, just like no two flowers or oils are the same. The SWITCH’s versatility is simply astounding.

A Battery Built for Real Life

The SWITCH is capable of up to 150 uses on a single charge. These are not laboratory numbers, this is real life. For the average user, this means well over a week of use on a single charge. Add to that the convenience of pass-through charging, and you can choose to use the SWITCH whichever way fits your life. This kind of efficiency and versatility in a device as powerful as the SWITCH is simply unheard of. Taking into account that a full charge takes only 60 minutes, it’s safe to say the SWITCH is in a league of its own.

The Power & Speed of Induction

The patent-pending induction heating technology inside allows the device to heat to target temperature in an incredibly short amount of time. We’re talking an average of 4 seconds (depending on selected temperature). This sort of speed is simply not possible with traditional convection and conduction vaporizers. On top of that, the induction heating setup allows for the electronics to be completely sealed off from the heating element, meaning absolutely no possibility of mechanical failure due to leakage. You can literally pour water into the heating element of the SWITCH and press the button and it would simply bring the water inside the dish to a boil. The SWITCH is NOT like other vaporizers.

entry.title: Yocan UNI Pro Digital Box Mod
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Vaporizer
Price: 22.50

The Yocan UNI Pro is a universally compatible Digital Box Mod that works with all oil atomizers of all lengths and sizes. It brings vape customization and personalization to the next level.

This Patented Digital Box Mod features a chamber with adjustable width and height to ensure that all oil atomizers will fit snugly regardless of size or shape. In addition to its patented adjustable design, it also features a 10-second preheat function, a volt range of 2.0V–4.2V, and a hanging hole for easy attachment to a strap or lanyard. The bright OLED display clearly indicates voltage and remaining change, and the simple button interface allows for easy operation.

The Yocan UNI Pro Digital Box Mod celebrated for its minimalist design, amazing portability, and straightforward operation. It’s perfect for travelling and can be enjoyed by vape users at every experience level. Available in a wide variety of colors, there’s a UNI Pro for every occasion and it will still make an excellent addition to your collection. With unmatched customization and impressive performance, You’ll be vaping like a pro in no time with the UNI Pro Digital Box Mod from Yocan.

Specs & Features:

  • Yocan Patented Design
  • Fit Your Favorite 510 Cartridges
  • Customize Voltage Option (2.0V to 4.2V)
  • Universal Box Mod & Oil Level Window
  • Compact & Portable
  • 650mAh Battery Capacity & USB Charging
  • 510-Threaded Magnetic Connection
  • Adjustable Chamber Height & Width
  • 15 seconds cut-off
  • Preheat Mode: Click the power button twice
  • OLED Display
  • Built with Hanging Hole

Included Items

  • 1 x Yocan UNI Pro Box Mod
  • 1 x Micro USB Cable
  • 1 x Magnetic 510 Ring
  • 1 x User Manual

entry.title: CHEECH & CHONG'S THE RIPPER CERAMIC VAPORIZER KIT
entry.s:vendor: Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke
Type: Vaporizer
Price: 29.99

The Cheech & Chong Up in Smoke Ripper Kit is a vaporizer that has been designed for enjoying your favourite wax or concentrate in a stylish portable device. The full-ceramic and coil-less atomizer is designed for even heat distribution and perfect flavour. The deep chamber can hold a good amount of your favourite product to save time with reloading. The Ripper Kit heats up quickly providing 15 seconds of continuous use.

Special Features:

  • Deep Full-ceramic and coil-less atomizer designed for even heat distribution
  • Compatible with wax and concentrates
  • Portable and stylish design
  • Lithium-ion Battery

Product Specifications:

  • Size: 4.45" x .72" x .72"
  • Battery: Internal 950 mAh
  • Voltage Output: 3.7 v, 4.2 v

Directions:

  1. Remove the mouthpiece from The Ripper to expose the heating chamber
  2. Apply a small amount of wax or concentrate product into the chamber on the ceramic heating disc
  3. Refit the Ripper mouthpiece ensuring it is completely attached
  4. To lock/unlock the Ripper, press the fire button 5 times simultaneously. The lights on the button will flash 3 times to indicate it has become locked/unlocked
  5. Press and hold the fire button and inhale slowly. To keep the Ripper at peak performance levels, it has a maximum 15 second puff duration. The power button will blink 5 times when the maximum puff duration has elapsed

Product Includes:

  • 1 x 950 mAh battery
  • 1 x Ceramic Atomizer
  • 1 x Micro USB Charging Cord
  • 1 x Dab Tool with Silicone Tip
  • 1 x User Manual
  • 1 x Collectors Box

Pro Tip Make sure you do not overfill the chamber or else once heated it will leak onto the top of the battery. Also, clean the connections on the Ripper and battery regularly to ensure a clean positive connection.
entry.s:tag: Vendor_Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke

Vendor: Exxus

The Exxus Plus VV Cartridge Vaporizer by Exxus Vape has a simple design quality and thoughtfully crafted user-friendly features. Because this is a variable voltage, pen-style battery, the Exxus Plus' voltage can be adapted to a range of anywhere between 2.6V and 4.0V. The 510 threading of the attachment port is a near universal count among the vaping industry. This makes the Exxus Plus an easy addition to an expansive variety of devices. Each feature works to provide users with unmatched vaping.

entry.title: Exxus EX3 1ml Cartridge Silver
entry.summary:
Vendor: Exxus
Type: Cartridge
Price: 3.50

The Exxus EX3 Oil Cartridge has a 1ml capacity and can hold e-liquid or herbal oils. The exterior is made from borosilicate glass and the interior is stainless steel with a ceramic coil. Ceramic coils retain heat longer, which means less wear and tear on the battery and the best delivery of vapor. This ensures quality and tasty flavor. The EX3 cart has a flattened mouthpiece giving it a more comfortable and ergonomic draw. The male 510 threading works on a variety of Exxus products as well as a number of other batteries.

entry.title: Yocan Armor Concentrate Vaporizer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yocan
Type: Vaporizer
Price: 14.50

Features:
380mAh Battery Capacity
QDC Technology
10-Second Pre-Heat Function
Pre-set Temperature Profiles
Fast USB Charging
Inclusive Dab Tool

The Yocan Armor Concentrate Vaporizer is a discreet and stylish pen that’s perfect for portability. Utilizing a quality battery, a simple interface, optimal pre-set temperatures and a rapid charger make this extract vaporizer an ideal choice.

The Armor has a 380mAh battery so you can have long lasting sessions between charges. It charges quickly and lasts longer than other vaporizers of similar size. The USB cable is fast-charging and allows the battery to charge completely in 30 minutes. The USB cable enables you to charge your device on the go or at home. It can obtain power in 30 seconds by plugging it into a wall outlet.

Yocan Armor is easy to use for beginners and connoisseurs alike. It has single button operation so all functions can be performed using only one button. This includes powering the device on and off, changing temperature, activating pre-heat mode, and activating the heating element.

The vaporizer uses dual quartz coil technology, quartz is an ideal material to use because it heats up quickly. This, combined with the custom heat settings offer the best balance between big hits and quality flavor. The coils and coil cap use a threaded connection, this makes them easy to replace. It also makes loading so simple it can be done on the go.

The Yocan Armor allows you to customize your session. There are 3 pre-set temperatures chosen to be ideal for concentrates which include low – 3.0V, medium – 3.5V and high – 4.0V. This provides consistent flavor and dense clouds. Material can be pre-heated so you can continuously dab for 10 seconds, or the coils can be heated before adding extracts. The heat settings can also be used to help clean the device. If coils have built up resin, use the 10 second preheat function and watch the caked-on material dissipate.

What’s in the box:
1x Armor Pen
1x Extra QDC coil
1x Pick Tool
1x USB Cable
1x Instructions Manual

Vendor: XVape
Type: Vaporizer Accessory
Price: 8.50

This is the replacement carb cap for the XVape Vista Mini 2. Having spare parts is ideal in case you lose or break the original. This carb cap is made from handblown, borosilicate glass and features a hole in the top to allow your extracts to vaporize properly. The carb cap fits solidly above the heating coil, with an air tight seal. This carb cap is meant for the Vista Mini 2, any use on other rigs or vaporizers is up to the discretion of the customer and is not recommended.

entry.title: Xvape-Vista Mini 2 Glass Bubbler
entry.summary:
Vendor: XVape
Type: Vaporizer Accessory
Price: 12.49

This is the replacement glass bubbler for the XVape Vista Mini 2. Having spare parts is ideal in case you lose or break the original. The bubbler is made from handblown, borosilicate glass and has a red line on the side to show you the optimal level for water. This piece does not include the mouthpiece or carb cap, it is solely the bubbler. This glass bubbler is not meant for other vaporizers, it is meant for the Vista Mini 2 exclusively.

entry.title: Xvape-Vista Mini 2 Heating Coil
entry.summary:
Vendor: XVape
Type: Vaporizer Accessory
Price: 8.50

This is the replacement heating coil for the XVape Vista Mini 2. Having spare parts is always a good idea in case you lose or burn through the original. This atomizer has 510 threading, and is a quartz bucket style. Quartz is an ideal material as it can cope with high temperatures over a long period of time. It retains heat well, with less risk of breaking than other materials. This heating coil is not meant for other vaporizers, it is meant for the Vista Mini 2 exclusively.

entry.title: Xvape-Vista Mini 2
entry.summary:
Vendor: XVape
Type: Vaporizer
Price: 89.99

The XVape Vista Mini 2 is a portable, electronic dab rig with water filtration. The ergonomic flared mouthpiece makes long sessions a dream, while being able to easily remove the glass bubbler has clean freaks rejoicing. As always, the bubbler is made from handblown, borosilicate glass for added security.

Small enough to be discreet on your desk, or to take with you on the go thanks to its shock resistant, smell proof case, this lightweight vaporizer is the perfect addition to your dabbing collection. Unlike a lot of other devices which have you waiting forever for heat up time, the Vista Mini 2 reaches its set temperature in only 10 seconds. You get roughly 60 dabs between charges, giving you one more reason to make it your top choice for portability.

Whether you’re new to vaping extracts or consider yourself a connoisseur you’ll be pleased with the function and design of the Vista Mini 2. The solid construction and cutting edge technology blends seamlessly to create the ideal follow-up to the original Vista Mini. The AIO crystal quartz atomizer has been revolutionized with short circuit protection, and is now incredibly easy to remove and replace with just a couple twists. Haptic feedback is here to stay, along with the super handy wireless charging. Of course, if you’re at home the USB charger still does the trick. 

This vaporizer is adaptable to different consistencies of concentrates due to its 4 heat settings. Watch the eye-catching multi-coloured LED lights change based on your preferred temperature. Remarkable flavor and a strong vapor can be attributed to those well chosen pre-set heat settings too.

entry.title: Famous-Lit Sticc Variable Voltage Battery-12/Tray-Noir
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous Brandz
Type: Vaporizer
Price: 114.99

FEATURES 
320 mAh Battery 
Preheat mode 
Adjustable Voltage: 2.0V - 4.0V 
Fits all 510 Thread Cartridges 
USB Smart Charger 
Smart USB Rapid Charge 
Auto Shut-Off Safety 
Preserves Battery Cells 
Weight: 1.92 oz

The Lit Sticc Noir by Famous Brandz is a 510 threaded battery compatible with pre-filled or refillable cartridges. Featuring a sleek, matte black finish and variable voltage, this battery is indeed lit. Packaged in a tray of 12, the Lit Sticc Noir is designed with elegance and efficiency in mind.

The Lit Sticc Noir is a 320mAh battery, so you can enjoy puffing all day before recharging. Adjust the voltage between 2.0 and 4.0V depending on the type of material you’re using in your cartridge. The 510 thread size is the most common, so it will fit with the majority of available carts. The USB smart charger allows the device to specify the exact amount of current it requires and disconnects power once fully charged. The smart USB rapid charge provides a fast charge without requiring a wall block. For safety purposes and to prevent overheating the battery stops outputting power if the draw taken is too lengthy.

To turn the device on, quickly press the button 5 times. Hold that same button down to draw. It’s a personal preference whether you prefer to hold the button and heat up the material to get a massive hit or start drawing as soon as you press the button down for a more moderate hit.

Preheat mode can be activated by rapidly clicking the button 2 times, this allows for the battery to continuously heat for 15 seconds. The device also has an auto-shutoff to prevent overheating.

Variable voltage is achieved by simply twisting the bottom of the battery to desired temperature. The voltage range is between 2.0 and 4.0 volts. Remember, different viscosity’s will vaporize better at different temperatures.

To charge the battery, screw on the charger the same way you would thread the cartridge. It is recommended to charge in a computer or a similar device. Sometimes using a wall adapter (especially a high powered one) can cause damage to the battery. Also, the smart USB charger has a rapid charge so it will charge pretty quickly anyway.

The Lit Sticc tray features 12 of the iconic Noir. It’s well-designed as free POP to be able to perfectly display these simple, yet refined batteries. Grab a tray and get lit!

The USB smart charger allows the device to specify the exact amount of current it requires and disconnects power once fully charged. The smart USB rapid charge provides a fast charge without requiring a wall block. For safety purposes and to prevent overheating the battery stops outputting power if the draw taken is too lengthy.

To turn the device on, quickly press the button 5 times. Hold that same button down to draw. It’s a personal preference whether you prefer to hold the button and heat up the material to get a massive hit or start drawing as soon as you press the button down for a more moderate hit.

Sometimes using a wall adapter (especially a high powered one) can cause damage to the battery. Also, the smart USB charger has a rapid charge so it will charge pretty quickly anyway.

The Lit Sticc tray features a mixture of 6 unique designs including Safari, Knit, Pop, Acid, Taffy, and 8bit. The well-designed tray is free POP to be able to perfectly display these awesome batteries. Grab a tray and get lit!

Taffy
Swirly and deliciously sweet, this battery is waiting to match all your favorite outfits

Safari
The hunt is over, this battery has been safely captured and released back into the wild

8bit
This retro battery is awesome for chilling out and playing old school video games

Knit
Put down those knitting needles and pick up this battery for something else to do with your idle hands

Acid
This battery’s a funky and psychedelic trip, ideal for parties and bringing good vibes

Pop
This battery has been tagged in the classic graffiti style to pair perfectly with your alley photoshoots

entry.title: Randy's Chill Screen 5 Pack Replacement
entry.summary:
Vendor: Randy's
Type: Vaporizer Accessory
Price: 2.63

This is the replacement Screen pack for the Randy’s Chill vaporizer. It adds protection against debris clogging up the device and getting in places you don’t want it to. Make sure the screens are cleaned or replaced regularly. The screen is there to provide cleaner, smoother hits. If the screen isn’t cleaned or replaced often it will be hard to pull and you won’t get as large of a hit. These screens are easily cleaned with 99% alcohol or any of Randy’s Cleaners.

entry.title: Randy's Chill Grommet & Screen Replacement
entry.summary:
Vendor: Randy's
Type: Vaporizer Accessory
Price: 1.88

This is the replacement Grommet and Screen combination for the Randy’s Chill vaporizer. It adds protection against debris clogging up the device and getting in places you don’t want it to. Make sure this piece (the screen especially) is cleaned on a regular basis to provide cleaner, and smoother hits. If the screen isn’t cleaned it will be harder to pull and you won’t get as large of a hit. Using 99% alcohol or any Randy’s Cleaner on the screen will easily remove grime, and the Orange Label cleaner is safe for the Rubber Grommet.

This glass piece is easily cleaned with 99% alcohol or any of Randy’s Cleaners.
